summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of BRICK AI Caseworker app with Wizard of Oz theme. All role-based logins work correctly, premium styling is applied consistently, and the React Markdown issue from iteration 1 has been fixed. No visible Emergent branding found.

minor.issue: Returns 404 - endpoint not implemented yet (UI handles gracefully)
Returns 404 - endpoint not implemented yet (UI handles gracefully)

passed_tests: Landing page displays with premium Wizard of Oz theme
Golden BRICK title with gold-text shimmer effect
Emerald gradient background (oz-gradient class)
6 feature cards with premium styling
Glitter effects visible on page
Yellow brick road pattern visible
No visible 'Made with Emergent' branding
Login/Register tabs switch correctly
Login form displays all fields correctly
Register form displays all fields correctly
Agency login (agency@help.org) redirects to Agency Dashboard
Agency Dashboard shows unified client database with emerald theme
Cleanup crew login (cleanup@vegas.gov) redirects to Cleanup Dashboard
Cleanup Dashboard shows amber/orange theme with sweep scheduling
Legal aid login (lawyer@legalaid.org) redirects to Legal Aid Portal
Legal Aid Portal shows indigo/purple theme with tabs
Regular user login (testuser@example.com) redirects to BRICK Chat
BRICK Chat displays welcome message with premium styling
BRICK Chat sends messages successfully
BRICK AI responds with formatted markdown (React Markdown issue FIXED)
Dossier update toast notification works
All dashboards have consistent premium styling
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: /api/cleanup/sweeps and /api/legal/cases endpoints return 404 but UI handles gracefully with empty states
Note: Emergent scripts remain in index.html for infrastructure purposes but visible badge has been removed
context_for_next_testing_agent: All role-based authentication and dashboards are working. The React Markdown className issue from iteration 1 has been fixed. Premium Wizard of Oz theme is applied consistently across all pages. Two backend endpoints (/api/cleanup/sweeps and /api/legal/cases) return 404 but the UI handles this gracefully with empty state displays.
issues_fixed_from_previous_iteration: React Markdown component error - FIXED: AI responses now display correctly without className prop errors
Tab switching issue - FIXED: Login/Register tabs now switch correctly
